product_name: The North Face Makalu Insulated Jacket - Men's
long_description: Built for fast-moving alpine adventures in cold weather, the PrimaLoft(R)-insulated, waterproof, breathable Makalu jacket for men from The North Face offers exceptional range of use. Waterproof, seam-taped HyVent(R) Alpha shell lets perspiration escape so you stay dry on the inside, too. PrimaLoft(R) One is a patented ultrafine microfiber blend that offers downlike softness, and is incredibly lightweight and water repellent. Body is insulated with 133g of PrimaLoft One and sleeves with 100g PrimaLoft One. Sleek, helmet-compatible hood is fully adjustable and has a laminated brim. Brushed collar lining adds comfort. Zippered hand pockets are harness and pack compatible; Napoleon chest pocket; inner zippered pocket. Interior, pocket-accessed hem cord cinches out cold. The North Face Makalu insulated jacket for men is also windproof.
